name: Aberration Kinship
summary: Your mind resonates with the inscrutable thought processes that inhuman aberrations use to communicate.
description:
Your mind resonates with the inscrutable thought processes that inhuman aberrations use to communicate. You can cast mindlink as an innate occult spell once per day, but you can target only aberrations.Traits

Fleshwarp: A humanoid transformed so completely by outside forces that they are now a unique ancestry
